description.value:
Choose a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.Connection]{Connection}. You become trained in the connection's skill or, if you were already trained, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You don't gain any other abilities from your choice of connection. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.class-features.Item.Mystic Bond]{Mystic Bond} class feature.

You cast spells like a mystic and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with two common cantrips from the spell list granted by your connection, from the spells granted by your connection, or any other cantrips of that tradition you learn or discover. You're trained in the spell attack modifier and spell DC statistics. Your key spellcasting attribute for mystic archetype spells is Wisdom, and they are mystic spells of your connection's tradition.
